# <a name="error-550553-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="10f51-102">Pogreška 550/553 u Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="10f51-102">Error 550/553 in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="10f51-103">Kada niste kod kuće i šaljete poruku e-pošte s povezanog računa pomoću Outlook.com, vaša se poruka e-pošte može vratiti s porukom o pogrešci koja je zabranjena od 550, 553 ili je zabranjena.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="10f51-103">When you're away from home and send an email from your connected account using Outlook.com, your email message might be returned with a 550, 553, or relay-prohibited error message.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="10f51-104">Provjera [postavki sinkronizacije e-pošte](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) u **postavkama**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="10f51-104">Check your [email sync settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) at **Settings**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="10f51-105">> **Prikaz svih postavki programa** > **Outlook E-pošta** > **Sinkronizacija e-pošte**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="10f51-105">> **View all Outlook settings** > **Mail** > **Sync email**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="10f51-106">Provjerite je li zadana adresa jednaka nazivu domene e-pošte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="10f51-106">Make sure your default from address is the same as your email domain name.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="10f51-107">Ako ste uključili vlastitu domenu e-pošte, promijenite je u outlook.com, live.com ili hotmail.com adresu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="10f51-107">If you have your own email domain included, change it to your outlook.com, live.com, or hotmail.com address.</span></span>
